default.title: City's Residences
default.description: At the heart of life, being able to dedicate time to yourself and your loved ones is transforming life into art.

pageTitle.title: PROJECT
pageTitle.description:
A mixed-use living project

thoughtfully designed in every detail.

blockParking.title: Block and Parking Entrances
blockParking.p1: Each block features uniquely designed lobbies and entrances, offering a secure and prestigious welcome.
blockParking.p2: Spacious parking areas and direct block connections ensure convenient, time-saving access.

greenAreas.title: Green Spaces
greenAreas.p1: A serene life in the heart of nature with over 50,000 m² of landscaped green areas.

architectsSay.title: The Architects Describe the Project
architectsSay.p1: City’s Residences was designed with an architectural language that prioritizes quality of life over ostentation.

architecture.quote: With a mixed-use model, we give time back: live, work, and enjoy—within a single ecosystem.

interior.quote: Not showiness, but quality of life: we created ‘hidden luxury’ with timeless materials and refined details.

landscape.quote: Inspired by the Northern Forests and Istanbul’s endemic species, every shade of green has been brought into the project.

structural.quote: Not only a technical achievement; City’s Residences is designed to offer residents a peaceful home.

contact.description:
Thank you for your interest in City's Residences.

Please fill out the registration form below so our team can contact you.

errors.required: Please enter a valid telephone number
errors.min: Telephone number must be at least 8 characters long
errors.max: Telephone number must be at most 15 characters long

errors.email: Please enter a valid email address

successDialog.title: Thank You for Your Interest
successDialog.description: A representative from our sales team will contact you shortly. We look forward to speaking with you and sharing details about this special project.

thankYou.title: Thank You.
thankYou.message1: Your appointment request has successfully reached our team.

section1.title3: Managing time is the art of turning life into a masterpiece.

map.title: In the heart of Istanbul, in the prestigious location of Kozyatağı, have the privilege of shaping the city and time according to your own rhythm.

p1.title: LIVE MORE
p1.description: At the center of life, live more by joyfully dedicating time to yourself and your loved ones, transforming life into art.

p2.title: LIVE MORE PEACEFULLY
p2.description: Live more peacefully in secure spaces where different and timeless architecture meets the generosity of nature.

p3.title: LIVE MORE RICHLY
p3.description: Live more richly with a new life design that brings together sports, art, culture, shopping, entertainment, and much more.

livePeacefully.title: Live more peacefully.
livePeacefully.description: Live in peace and security, in spaces where distinctive and timeless architecture meets the generosity of nature.

liveFully.title: Live more fully.
liveFully.description: Live more fully with a new life design that brings together sports, art, culture, shopping, entertainment, and much more.

citys-park.description:
In the heart of the city,

a green oasis that slows you down…

citys-members-club.description:
Where art, sports, and social privileges converge

in an exclusive living space.

citys-istanbul-avm.description: Experience life in all its colors.

noResults.title: No results found for your search criteria.

hero.title: City's DNA
hero.subtitle:
The City of the Future Has Arrived.

Life Reimagined:

futureCity.title:
The City of the Future

Has Arrived.
futureCity.description:
Imagine a place that makes every moment you live more meaningful, more enjoyable, and more peaceful.

A lifestyle model where life fits into a five-minute walk…

This is City's Residences.
futureCity.p2:
City's Residences is not just about buildings; it is a vision.

A signature placed on future urban living today; a valuable legacy to be left for future generations.

microCity.title: A Micro-City Within the City...
microCity.description:
On the rising life axis of Istanbul, Kozyatağı and Istanbul Financial Center line,

At the intersection of E-5 and TEM, with direct connection to the metro, City's Residences is a micro-city that keeps all the city's opportunities at its own center.
microCity.p2: One of Europe's few mixed-use projects, City's Residences is a very easy lifestyle model that brings together residence, office, mall, culture, art, social life, park, garden, and specially landscaped green areas…

citysLiving.title: Lifestyle Model: City's Living
citysLiving.description:
City’s Living is a lifestyle that combines technology, aesthetics, and comfort.

It makes life easier, making every moment meaningful, accessible, and special.

Being a part of City’s Living means living the future today.

lifeIn5Minutes.title: "Life in 5 Minutes"
lifeIn5Minutes.description:
City's Residences offers a lifestyle model where all of life is within a 5-minute walking distance for the first time in Turkey:

Home – Office: 2 min, Sports & Spa: 2 min, Shopping: 3 min, Performing Arts Center: 3 min, Social life: 3 min, Metro: 4 min, School & Hospital: 5 min...



A life where everything is at your fingertips without needing your vehicle.

City's Living designed this life for you.

worldClassLife.title: A World-Class Life
worldClassLife.p1: City's Residences is a world-class mixed-use project offering residence, office, shopping, culture, art, entertainment, and well-being opportunities together…
worldClassLife.p2: One of Europe's most attractive living spaces, City's Residences brings you together with a human-focused and high-standard life.
worldClassLife.p3: City's Residences and City's Living built a functional, aesthetic, ergonomic, and timeless architecture by bringing together the best in the field. This understanding transformed life into art.
worldClassLife.strong: Names in the "Art of Living" vision:

list.item2: Mustafa Toner and Emre Toner design in interior architecture,
list.item3: Peace engineering with Melih Bulgur, the expert name in static and earthquake safety,
list.item4: A unique oasis in the city with the signature of Pınar & Cemil Aktaş at City's Park.

citysPark.title: City's Park: An Oasis in the City
citysPark.strong:
City's Park, with a size of 50,000 m², removes the boundary between city life and nature.

Here, green is not just a view; it is a fundamental part of your daily life.
citysPark.p1: Gardens, parks, walking areas, pools, children's playgrounds and outdoor sports areas, amphitheaters, bicycle tracks, and recreation areas located in City’s Park are right at the center of your daily life.

smartBuildings.title: Smart Buildings, Integrated and Sustainable Living
smartBuildings.titleBalancer: Smart Buildings, Integrated and Sustainable Living

list.item1: IoT-supported infrastructure and AI-controlled building management
list.item5: Disaster simulations and building maintenance planning with Digital Twins

privileges.title: Privileges That Make Life Easier
privileges.p1: City's Residences brings life together at a single address:

list.item2: City's Members Club (6,500 m² – sports, spa, hobby, and social areas)
list.item5: JustWork Office Campus, JustAcademy, JustStay Hotel, JustEvent

privileges.strong: One address, all life: CITY'S RESIDENCES x CITY'S LIVING

globalVision.title: A Global Management Vision
globalVision.p1: City's Residences is one of the newest and most prestigious projects in the WAM Asset Management portfolio.
globalVision.p2: WAM Asset Management portfolio includes international projects such as City's Nişantaşı Mall, City's Istanbul Mall, Meydan Istanbul Mall, JustWork Office Campus, Gebze Logistics Center, Elegance Hotel International, New York IGT Shopping Mall.
globalVision.p3: WAM Asset Management transforms City's Residences into a properly managed investment with global value in every sense, with its corporate power, brand trust, sustainable rental income, and international network advantage.

conclusion.title: Final Word
conclusion.p1:
Life at City's Residences doesn't just get easier; it is redefined.

Elegance in every step, peace in every moment, art of living in every detail.
conclusion.welcome: Welcome to the best version of your life.

pageTitle.title: RESIDENCES
pageTitle.description: From daily routines to lifelong memories, every detail has been designed to turn your home into your own world.

hero.title: A comfortable touch to your life.
hero.description: At the heart of life, make time for yourself and your loved ones—live more fully, turning life into art.

types.title: Different needs, one shared lifestyle.
types.description: From small details to grand spaces… Discover the ideal living area for you and your family among the diverse apartment types at City's Residences.

menu.home: At the center of life, live more by joyfully dedicating time to yourself and your loved ones, transforming life into art.
menu.project: A mixed-use living project thoughtfully designed in every detail.
menu.residences: Every corner carefully designed, with all lines opening to a refreshing breath...
menu.citysPark:
Share your morning walk with the sky, leave your evening energy to the ground.

In 50,000 m² of green, meet nature without leaving the city.
menu.citysMembersClub: A morning coffee, a small lunchtime meeting, an impromptu evening celebration... Gather around a table with friends in nature, or host an unforgettable event under the lights. No formality, just your rhythm, your space...
menu.citysIstanbulAvm: Experience world-renowned prestigious brands within a few steps, meet the fresh coffee aroma, take a break at gourmet flavor stops; meet art, culture, entertainment, and leave the day's hustle peacefully behind...

Live More Peacefully...

Live More Fully...

pdplRelatedInformation.title: Personal Data Protection and Processing Disclosure Text (PDPL)

section1.title: 1. Data Controller, Data Subject
section1.content: Citys Real Estate Development Inc. ("Data Controller") holds the title of Data Controller within the scope of Law No. 6698 on the Protection of Personal Data ("PDPL"), and you, as a natural person, are accepted and defined as the Data Subject. We would like to inform you, as the Data Subject, regarding the processing of your Personal Data specified below, that we process them as the Data Controller in compliance with the general principles set forth in Article 4 of the PDPL, that we attach importance to the security of personal data belonging to the Data Subject, and that we have an obligation to inform pursuant to Article 10 of the PDPL.

section2.title: 2. Processed Personal Data, Processing Purposes, Legal Bases, Transfer and Collection
section2.content: The responsibility for obtaining the Explicit Consent of References for the transfer of data to your References for the purpose of confirming Personal Data belongs to you. In addition, we do not accept any legal liability as the Data Controller in case Personal Data belonging to your References are obtained unlawfully.

items.identity: Identity: Name Surname – Date of Birth – Gender

section2_2.title: 2.2. Processing Purposes of Your Personal Data
section2_2.content: Your collected personal data may be processed by the Company for the matters below in compliance with the personal data processing conditions specified in Articles 5 and 6 of the Law, primarily for the fulfillment of the obligations of the Company and the real and legal persons in business relations with the Company, making notifications regarding updates, establishment and fulfillment of contracts to be made with you, carrying out various advertising and marketing activities, obtaining your opinion through surveys and polls, determining products, projects and services suitable for you, customizing and developing them, providing effective customer service, carrying out necessary work to enable you to benefit from products and services offered by our Company and conducting related business processes:
items: Realization of price quotation processes and collection of payments.
Ensuring the legal, technical and commercial-business security of the Company and relevant persons in business relations with the Company,
Fulfillment of official institution requests and providing information to authorized organizations arising from legislation,
Ensuring compliance with storage obligations foreseen in legislation,
Responding to data subject applications in accordance with legislation and carrying out necessary procedures,
Storage of data for the purpose of constituting evidence in possible disputes,
Ensuring the security of Company premises and/or facilities,
Tracking and management of customer requests and complaints,
Conducting customer satisfaction studies,
Tracking and conducting legal affairs,
Conducting audit / ethics activities,
Conducting operational activities.

section2_3.title: 2.3. Personal Data Based on Explicit Consent
section2_3.content: Your collected personal data may be processed with your explicit consent for marketing, analysis, customization, promotion and similar purposes.

section2_4.title: 2.4. Transfer of Processed Personal Data
section2_4.content: Processed personal data may be transferred to certain persons and organizations provided that relevant legal conditions are complied with and security measures are taken.

section2_5.title: 2.5. Collection Method and Legal Basis
section2_5.content: Your personal data may be collected physically and digitally through different channels and are processed based on the legal bases specified in Article 5 of the PDPL.

section3.title: 3. Destruction Policy
section3.content: Processed personal data are stored for periods determined by legislation or reasonable periods, and are deleted, destroyed or anonymized when the period expires.

section4.title: 4. Your Rights as Data Subject
section4.content: You have the following rights within the scope of PDPL:
items: Learning whether personal data are processed,
Requesting information if processed,
Learning the processing purpose,
Knowing third parties to whom data are transferred domestically/abroad,
Requesting correction if processed incompletely/incorrectly,
Requesting deletion/destruction if reasons requiring processing no longer exist,
Objecting to analysis results through automated systems,
Requesting compensation in case of damage.
section4.application: You can submit your applications to
section4.address: or physically to "Teşvikiye Mah. Teşvikiye Cd. Nişantaşı City's No: 12 İç Kapı No: K.5 Şişli/ İstanbul". Applications must be in Turkish, identity information and relevant documents must be attached. Applications made by proxy must include a power of attorney.
section4.note: This text is an integral part of the contract you have made with the Company. It may be updated in accordance with PDPL and board decisions.

commercialElectronicMessage.title: Commercial Electronic Message Disclosure Text
commercialElectronicMessage.paragraph1: This Commercial Electronic Message Disclosure Text ("Disclosure Text") has been prepared to inform you about the sending of commercial electronic messages to you and the processing, storage and transfer of your personal data within the scope of Law No. 5809 on Electronic Communication ("EHK"), Law No. 6563 on the Regulation of Electronic Commerce ("ETK") and Law No. 6698 on the Protection of Personal Data ("PDPL") and relevant legislation, as Citys Real Estate Development Inc. ("Company").
commercialElectronicMessage.paragraph2: The identity information (name, surname) and contact information (e-mail address, phone number) you have shared with the Company will be processed based on the explicit consent legal basis pursuant to Article 5, paragraph 1 of the PDPL, limited to the commercial electronic message approval condition pursuant to Article 6 of the ETK and the commercial electronic message sending activity, for the purposes of using in marketing communication by the Company if you give commercial message approval, sending electronic commercial messages through channels including instant/short message, phone, e-mail for which you have given consent, conducting activities aimed at customer satisfaction, conducting marketing analysis studies, conducting advertising, campaign promotion processes, conducting marketing processes of product services, creating campaigns for customers, determining target audience, conducting activities to increase user experience by tracking customer movements, conducting direct and indirect marketing, personalized marketing and remarketing activities, conducting personalized segmentation, targeting, analysis and internal reporting activities, market research, planning and execution of customer satisfaction activities, customizing and recommending the products and services offered by the Company to relevant persons according to their preferences, usage habits and needs, and planning and execution of customer relationship management processes, including generally planning and execution of marketing processes of products and/or services of the Company and its affiliates, and planning and execution of processes for creating and/or increasing loyalty to products and/or services offered by the Company and its affiliates.
commercialElectronicMessage.paragraph3: You can withdraw your consent regarding the sending of electronic commercial messages at any time.
commercialElectronicMessage.paragraph4: Your personal data will be used by the Company directly or through data processors, limited to the purposes specified above, and may be shared with our technological infrastructure suppliers.
commercialElectronicMessage.paragraph5: You have the rights listed in Article 11 of the PDPL in accordance with the Communiqué on the Procedures and Principles of Application to the Data Controller, and you can access the application methods regarding your rights and requests regarding your processed personal data from the "
commercialElectronicMessage.linkText: Citys Real Estate Development Inc. Disclosure Text on the Processing and Protection of Personal Data

explicitConsent.title: Explicit Consent Text for Transfer of Personal Data
explicitConsent.paragraph1: Pursuant to Law No. 6698 on the Protection of Personal Data ("PDPL"), Citys Real Estate Development Inc. ("Company") holding the title of Data Controller requests your explicit consent for the transfer of your personal data processed within the scope of the "Personal Data Protection and Processing Disclosure Text" shared with you, in the ways specified below, except for the cases where consent is not required as specified in Article 9 of the Law:
explicitConsent.paragraph2: I give my explicit consent and approval after being informed about the above matters, understanding the matters subject to disclosure and learning about my legal rights regarding the records, for the transfer of my personal data such as Identity, Contact, Professional Experience, Marketing Information, Legal Transaction Information, Finance, Customer Transactions, Transaction Security to third parties domestically and/or abroad, limited to the purposes specified in the Disclosure Text and in addition to these purposes, for the purpose of conducting collection, processing, storage and archiving activities, based on the "Explicit Consent" legal basis regulated in Articles 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 of the PDPL, due to the servers used in the Company's technical infrastructure being located abroad and for the purpose of providing service to me, within the scope specified in the Disclosure Text.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.paragraph1: As Citys Real Estate Development Inc. ("Company"), we use cookies and some other similar technologies and products (all together referred to as "Cookies") to enable you to benefit efficiently from our website and to improve your user experience.
cookiePolicy.paragraph2: This text contains explanations regarding the Cookies that will be used if you visit the www.citysresidences.com website (referred to as "Site"). If you prefer not to use cookies, you can delete or block Cookies from your browser settings. However, we would like to remind you that this may affect your use of the Site.
cookiePolicy.paragraph3: You can access the disclosure text regarding your personal data that we process as Citys Real Estate Development Inc. with the title of "Data Controller" within the scope of Law No. 6698 on the Protection of Personal Data ("PDPL") through the Disclosure Text link on the Site.

section1.title: 1. What are Cookies and Other Similar Technologies?
section1.content1: A cookie is a small-sized text file saved to your computer or mobile device through your browser when you visit a website. Cookies enable the presentation of personalized pages to provide a more efficient operation of a site as well as a more suitable and faster visit experience according to your personal needs. Cookies only contain information about your visit history on the internet and do not collect any information about files stored on your computer or mobile device.
section1.content2: In addition, there are some technologies ("Cookie-Like Technologies") used for similar purposes as Cookies:
items: Pixel tags (transparent graphical images placed on a website and showing that a page is displayed),
Mobile device identifiers (storage of information regarding the use of a mobile device through IDFA, advertising ID etc. in third-party environments),

Segmentation/Reporting Products (programs/products that work through some ready-made codes added to websites or mobile devices in various ways and report/interpret/store users' movements on websites or mobile devices thanks to these codes)
section1.content3: The term Cookie used in this text will also cover Cookie-Like Technologies.

section2_1.title: 2.1. Cookies in terms of validity periods:

session.title: Session Cookies:
session.content: Session Cookies are temporary cookies used during visitors' visits to the website and deleted after the browser is closed. The main purpose of using this type of cookies is to ensure the proper operation of the website during your visit. For example; filling out online forms consisting of multiple pages is possible thanks to these cookies.

persistent.title: Persistent Cookies:
persistent.content: Persistent cookies are types of cookies used to increase the functionality of the website and provide faster and better service. This type of cookies is used to remember visitors' preferences and is stored on visitors' devices through browsers. Some types of persistent cookies can be used to offer special recommendations to visitors considering matters such as the purpose of using the website. Thanks to persistent cookies, when the website is visited again with the same device, it is checked whether there is a cookie created by the website on visitors' devices, and if there is, it is understood that the website has been visited before and the content to be conveyed to visitors is determined accordingly. Cookie-Like Technologies are also included in this scope.

firstParty.title: First-party cookies:
firstParty.content: They are placed directly on visitors' devices by the website. First-party cookies are identified by the website you are browsing and can only be read by this site.

thirdParty.title: Third-party cookies:
thirdParty.content: Third-party cookies are identified by other organizations used for different services. For example, external data analysis services we benefit from and suppliers providing this service identify cookies on our behalf to report what is popular and what is not.

section2_3.title: 2.3. Cookies in terms of usage purposes:

mandatory.title: Mandatory Cookies:
mandatory.content: Mandatory cookies are cookies necessary to browse the website and use features such as accessing secure areas of the site (logging in, filling out forms, remembering privacy preferences). These cookies are used for purposes such as security and verification, are not used for any marketing purpose and do not identify you. Remembering previous actions when returning to a page within the same session can be given as an example.

functionality.title: Functionality cookies:
functionality.content: Functionality cookies enable remembering the choices you make in website history (your username, region you are in or language you use) for a more personalized online experience. The information collected by these cookies may include sensitive data that can identify you such as your username or profile picture. Not allowing the use of this type of cookies may cause a feature specific to you not to be used and prevents remembering your preferences.

performance.title: Performance cookies:
performance.content: These cookies help interpret how visitors interact with the website by collecting information such as how you use the website, which pages you visit and which links you click. These cookies are used to improve the site. They are used by website owners to estimate the number of unique visitors, identify the most important search engine keywords leading to a web page or monitor the browsing situation on the website. These cookies do not identify you. All data is collected anonymously and combined.

marketing.title: Marketing cookies:
marketing.content: These cookies are used to present content close to you and your areas of interest. They can also be used to present targeted advertisements or limit the number of times an advertisement is displayed to you. Many types of these cookies can collect identity-identifying information by tracking consumers.

section3.title: 3. What happens if Cookies are not accepted?
section3.content: If you decide not to accept cookies, certain features of the website may not be displayed or may not work correctly. This limits what you can do on the website and may have an impact on design and user experience.
section3.affectedFeatures: Features that may be affected include:
items: The website cannot be experienced in a personalized way
Watching videos
Liking or sharing this page on social networks
Displaying embedded content

section4.title: 4. How Can You Block the Use of Cookies?
section4.content: Although the use of cookies enables the website or mobile device to provide better service, you can block the use of cookies if you wish. However, remember that in this case, the website or mobile application may not fully function and you may not be able to benefit from all features. To block the use of cookies, you need to change the settings of your internet browser you use. These changes vary according to the device and internet browser you use. Below is information on which steps should be followed to block the use of cookies through different internet browsers:

ga.name: _ga_#
ga.details: Used by Google Analytics to collect data on how many times a user visits the website as well as dates of first and last visits.
